subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Patrick Sharp scored on a rebound 1 minute 52 seconds into overtime Friday night to give the Chicago Blackhawks a victory that cut the Red Wings’ lead in the Western Conference finals to 2-1.
snippet: Patrick Sharp scored on a rebound 1 minute 52 seconds into overtime Friday night to give the Chicago Blackhawks a victory that cut the Red Wings’ lead in the Western Conference finals to 2-1.
